Reviews.Title: “Confortable, clean and cheap”

Reviews.Content: booked octopus travel found bargain breakfast included clean comfortable hotel nice quiet serviced daily staff welcoming friendly breakfast standard german selection cold meats cereal eggs etc nice head breakfast hotel body eat minute five minute walk tube station lots local attractions nearby loved berlin staying visit

Reviews.Title: “Clean, fiendly and good value for money”

Reviews.Content: value clean friendly helpfull staff centre berlin 10 minutes su taxi return city centre cost €10 short distance downside breakfast costing €18 advise holding grabbing bite elsewhere church bells 9am sound door
